attributes.action: give funding to a railway station at Willenhall, ( Walsall )
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Central  Trains have been suggesting a station would be viable at Willenhall if there was some funding of a station. Byencourage a station build in the town it would make Willenhall more accessable to the rest of the Rail network and remove the need for commuting traffic by road.
